description: Common UX issues with remediation guidance

issues.title: Insufficient text contrast
issues.description: Text does not meet WCAG AA contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text
issues.remediation: Increase color difference. Use darker text or lighter background. Aim for 4.5:1 minimum, 7:1 for AAA.

issues.title: Color as only indicator
issues.description: Information is conveyed through color alone without additional visual cues
issues.remediation: Add icons, patterns, or text labels alongside color. Error states should have icons, not just red color.

issues.title: Missing form labels
issues.description: Form inputs lack associated <label> elements or aria-label
issues.remediation: Add <label for='id'> for each input, or use aria-label for icon-only inputs.

issues.title: Missing alt text on images
issues.description: Informative images lack alternative text descriptions
issues.remediation: Add descriptive alt text. Use alt='' for decorative images. Avoid 'image of' prefix.

issues.title: Keyboard trap
issues.description: Users cannot navigate away from a component using keyboard
issues.detection: Keyboard testing, Tab through all elements
issues.remediation: Ensure Tab and Shift+Tab move focus. Escape should close modals. Implement proper focus management.

examples.good: Modal closes on Escape, focus returns to trigger

issues.title: Missing focus indicators
issues.description: Interactive elements have no visible focus state
issues.remediation: Add visible focus styles. Use outline with 3:1 contrast. Don't use outline: none without replacement.

issues.title: Touch targets too small
issues.remediation: Increase clickable area to at least 44x44px. Add padding if visual size must stay small.

issues.title: Text too small
issues.description: Body text is smaller than 14px, causing readability issues
issues.remediation: Use minimum 16px for body text on desktop, 14px absolute minimum. Consider responsive scaling.

issues.title: Line length too long
issues.description: Text lines exceed 75 characters, reducing readability
issues.detection: Count characters per line, check max-width
issues.remediation: Add max-width to text containers. Aim for 45-75 characters per line.

issues.title: No loading indicator
issues.description: Async operations provide no feedback that action is in progress
issues.remediation: Show loading state within 300ms. Use spinners, skeletons, or progress bars.

examples.bad: Button does nothing visible for 2 seconds
examples.good: Button shows spinner immediately, success message on complete

issues.title: Data lost on error
issues.description: Form data is cleared when validation or submission fails
issues.detection: Submit invalid form, check data preservation
issues.remediation: Preserve all form data on errors. Use controlled inputs or autosave.

examples.good: Error message shown, all fields retain values

issues.title: Unclear error message
issues.description: Error messages don't explain the problem or how to fix it
issues.remediation: Use pattern: What happened + How to fix. Be specific and helpful.

examples.good: Password must be at least 8 characters. Add 3 more.

issues.title: No undo for destructive action
issues.description: Destructive actions cannot be undone and lack confirmation
issues.remediation: Add confirmation dialog or undo option. Soft delete where possible.

issues.title: Horizontal scroll on mobile
issues.description: Content causes horizontal overflow on narrow viewports
issues.detection: View at 320px width, check for horizontal scroll
issues.remediation: Use responsive units (%, vw). Add overflow handling. Test at 320px minimum.

examples.good: Responsive table with horizontal scroll container or card layout

issues.title: Confirm-shaming
issues.description: Decline option uses guilt-inducing or negative language
issues.remediation: Use neutral, equal-weight options. No guilt, no judgment.

examples.bad: No thanks, I don't want to save money

issues.title: Hidden costs
issues.description: Additional fees revealed only at final checkout step
issues.detection: Complete checkout flow, note when costs appear
issues.remediation: Show all costs upfront. Display fees on product/cart pages.

examples.bad: Service fee shown only on payment page
examples.good: All fees visible on product page and cart

issues.title: Missing hover state
issues.description: Interactive elements have no visual feedback on hover
issues.remediation: Add hover state with subtle visual change. Use cursor: pointer for clickables.

examples.good: Button has background color change and cursor: pointer

issues.title: Jargon in user-facing text
issues.description: Technical or internal terminology used in UI copy
issues.remediation: Replace with plain language. Write for grade 6-8 reading level.
